google-bigquery:position-deletes:v2.notes: BigQuery manages Iceberg tables internally; position deletes handled transparently for BigLake Iceberg tables
caveats: BigQuery abstracts away Iceberg internals; behavior depends on BigLake implementation

google-bigquery:position-deletes:v3.notes: BigQuery has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: BigQuery V3 support not yet announced

google-bigquery:equality-deletes:v2.notes: BigQuery manages deletes internally for BigLake Iceberg tables
caveats: BigQuery abstracts away Iceberg internals

google-bigquery:equality-deletes:v3.notes: BigQuery has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: BigQuery V3 support not yet announced

google-bigquery:merge-on-read:v2.notes: BigQuery handles read strategies internally for BigLake Iceberg tables
caveats: Strategy is managed by BigQuery, not user-configurable

google-bigquery:merge-on-read:v3.notes: BigQuery has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: BigQuery V3 support not yet announced

google-bigquery:copy-on-write:v2.notes: BigQuery uses copy-on-write for BigLake Iceberg table mutations

google-bigquery:copy-on-write:v3.notes: BigQuery has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: BigQuery V3 support not yet announced

google-bigquery:schema-evolution:v2.notes: Schema evolution supported for BigLake Iceberg tables including add, drop, rename columns and type changes

google-bigquery:schema-evolution:v3.notes: BigQuery has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: BigQuery V3 support not yet announced

google-bigquery:column-default-values:v2.notes: Column default values are a V3 feature

google-bigquery:hidden-partitioning:v2.notes: BigQuery supports table partitioning for BigLake Iceberg tables (in preview)

google-bigquery:hidden-partitioning:v3.notes: BigQuery has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: BigQuery V3 support not yet announced

google-bigquery:partition-evolution:v2.notes: BigQuery does not support Iceberg partition evolution for BigLake tables

google-bigquery:partition-evolution:v3.notes: BigQuery has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support

google-bigquery:table-maintenance:v2.notes: BigQuery provides automatic storage optimization including adaptive file sizing, clustering, and garbage collection
